sentences.sContent: ...a skinny, effeminate guy in lipstick and earrings.
sentences.sCn: ...一个抹口红、戴耳环，骨瘦如柴的娘娘腔男人。

synos.tran: 使柔弱；使无男子汉气概

remMethod.val: ef + femin(女) + ate → 露出女人气 → 柔弱的

words.tran: 使柔弱（等于effeminate）；使无男子汉气概

trans.tranCn: 柔弱的, 女人气的, 娇气的
trans.tranOther: a man who is effeminate looks or behaves like a woman
